% Title adjustments
\usepackage{titling}
\setlength{\droptitle}{-4em} % Fidgeting to raise logo to top margin

% Remove italics from 'author' (year) and 'date' (refuge)
\preauthor{\centering \Large}
\postauthor{\par}
\predate{\centering \Large}
\postdate{\par}

% Left justification without hyphenation
\usepackage[document]{ragged2e}
\usepackage[none]{hyphenat}

% Customization for better organized Latex tables
\usepackage{caption}
\captionsetup[table]{singlelinecheck=false, font=bf}
\captionsetup[figure]{font=bf}
\usepackage{amssymb} % checkmark symbol
\usepackage{array}
\usepackage{booktabs}
\usepackage{longtable}
\newcolumntype{L}[1]{>{\raggedright\let\newline\\\arraybackslash\hspace{0pt}}p{#1}}
\newcolumntype{C}[1]{>{\centering\let\newline\\\arraybackslash\hspace{0pt}}p{#1}}
\newcolumntype{R}[1]{>{\raggedleft\let\newline\\\arraybackslash\hspace{0pt}}p{#1}}
\newcolumntype{H}[1]{>{\raggedright\let\newline\\\arraybackslash\hspace{0pt}}m{#1}}
\newcolumntype{I}[1]{>{\centering\let\newline\\\arraybackslash\hspace{0pt}}m{#1}}
\newcolumntype{J}[1]{>{\raggedleft\let\newline\\\arraybackslash\hspace{0pt}}m{#1}}

\usepackage{float}
\usepackage{afterpage}
\usepackage{pdflscape}

% Put first float on page at top...
\makeatletter
\setlength{\@fptop}{0pt}
\makeatother

% To paste pdf figures in a figure environment
\usepackage{graphicx}
